channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-13403] Terms component fails for DatePointField
item.description: Getting terms for PointFields except DatePointField. For DatePointField, the request fails NPE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This adds support for DatePointField in TermsComponent

+1 overall

Commit c65451115c40c16b49ebcada04ae3f6731dc212f in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_8x from Munendra S N
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=c654511 ]

SOLR-13403: fix NPE in terms for DatePointField

  • This fixes NPE and adds support for DatePointField in terms
    component

These changes have introduced reproducible failures in DistributedTermsComponentTest

Commit 597241a412a0a27fa3a915df2934de3fdb5a376f in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Munendra S N
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=597241a ]

SOLR-13403: disable distrib test for point fields in terms

Commit c5d91017d0f0cee22c1167ca9634672274f17621 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_8x from Munendra S N
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=c5d9101 ]

SOLR-13403: disable distrib test for point fields in terms

Thanks hossman
For now, I have commented out the distributed case test. I was able to reproduce the failure in both master and 8x for distributed mode. There are no failures for standalone mode.

The exception is being thrown here. This codepath is not changed in this issue.
I was able to reproduce the issue for other point fields too. Looks like the test added here exposed already existing issue as none of previous test cases covered this codepath.

I will debug further and attach a patch for this soon

SOLR-13403.patch
The failure occurs when the collection/core doesn't contain any docs. It was possible in distrib mode that a shard might not any docs.
I have added tests for empty index
